div.h1:
New Plymouth School District
Exemplary Education Through Community and School

div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

div.h2: Welcome to New Plymouth School District

div.p:
Per the directive of the Idaho State Board of Education, the New Plymouth School District will be in a "soft closure" through the remainder of the school year, unless the community meets certain criteria in regards to the COVID-19 pandemic. During this time, all of our schools will be closed to students and the public.
The district will continue to provide educational opportunities for our students at their homes. Office hours for our teachers, schools, and district office will be from 10:00 am to 2:00 pm. No visitors will be permitted into the offices or buildings.
Free meals (lunch & breakfast) for children, 18 years old and younger, will be available to be picked up Monday through Friday at the following locations and times:
- New Plymouth Elementary School (704 South Plymouth Ave, New Plymouth, ID 83655) from 11:00 am to 1:00 pm
- The Sand Hollow Country Store (500 Sand Hollow Rd, Caldwell, ID 83607) from 11:30 am to 12:00 pm
The next regular meeting of the New Plymouth School Board will be Monday, May 11, 2020 at 6:00 pm through Google Hangouts Meet.
Click here at that time to watch the meeting.
